DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate the effects of the right ventricular septal pacing on left ventricular function compared with right ventricular apical pacing.
DOC.brief_title: Right Ventricular Septal Pacing for the Prevention of Left Ventricular Dysfunction in Patients With Atrio-Ventricular Block
DOC.criteria: the patients who need pacemaker implantation for atrioventricular block Pregnancy, left ventricular dysfunction at the time of implantation
